plugin.name: BWA Sampe
plugin.description: Convert BWA alignments to SAM format

param.name: max_ins
param.label: Maximum insert size for a read pair to be considered being mapped properly

param.name: max_occ
param.label: Maximum occurrences of a read for pairing

param.name: mem_index
param.label: Load the entire FM-index into memory to reduce disk operations

param.name: max_hitpaired
param.label: Maximum number of alignments to output in the XA tag for reads paired properly

param.name: max_hitdis
param.label: Maximum number of alignments to output in the XA tag for disconcordant read pairs
